ResourceHeader.ResourceName: AJ4CO Terminated Folded Dipole and Dual-Polarization Spectrograph system
ResourceHeader.Description:
Terminated Folded Dipole and Dual Polarization Spectrograph system at the AJ4CO Radio Astronomy Observatory in High Springs, Florida. The TFD array consists of two 4-element (32 foot) square array. Each antenna element is 32 feet long. Polarization is simulataneous RCP and LCP. TFD array is aligned to true north. The Dual-Polarization Spectrograph operates at 16 -32 MHz simultaneous RCP and LCP providing 300 channels per polarization (600 total). It is a swept frequency reeiver selectable 7.5, 15, 30, 60 kHz pre-detection bandwidth, ~6.7 sweeps/sec, integration time 500 microseconds per sample. The frequency resolution is 53 kHz, delta-T is 150 milliseconds.
See the Information URL for a link to a document providing additional descriptions of the instrument characteristics.

InformationURL.Name: RadioJOVE Spectrograph Users Group
InformationURL.Description: This site provide station diagrams and other reports for the receiver systems at several radio observatories associated with the RadioJOVE project.

InformationURL.Description: This site provides descriptions of radio receiver systems at AJ4CO as well as other radio astronomy-related documentation

InformationURL.Description: This site provides descriptions of radio receiver systems at AJ4CO, observation logs and other documentation
